INSERT INTO TB_SCHEDULE ( SCH_NO, CAL_NO, SCH_CONTENT, START_DATE, END_DATE, ADDRESS, SCH_IMPORT,
REG_DATE, MOD_DATE, MOD_ID, DEL_YN, SCH_TITLE ) VALUES ( SEQ_SCHNO.nextval, ( SELECT CAL_NO FROM TB_CALENDAR WHERE CAL_SUB_CODE = #{schCalSubCode} AND REG_ID = #{modId} ), #{schContent}, TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI'), TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI'), #{address}, #{schImport},
SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{modId}, 'N', #{schTitle} )
INSERT INTO TB_SHA_SCH ( SHARE_ID, SCH_NO, REG_DATE, MOD_DATE, REG_ID, MOD_ID, DEL_YN ) VALUES ( #{shareId}, SEQ_SCHNO.currval, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{userId}, #{userId}, 'N' )
mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT S.SCH_NO, S.SCH_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(S.START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI') AS START_DATE, TO_CHAR(S.END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI') AS END_DATE, S.ADDRESS, S.SCH_IMPORT,
S.SCH_TITLE, C.CAL_COLOR, C.CAL_SUB_CODE, C.CAL_NO, S.MOD_ID FROM TB_SCHEDULE S LEFT JOIN TB_CALENDAR C ON C.CAL_NO = S.CAL_NO LEFT JOIN TB_MEMBER M ON C.REG_ID = M.USER_ID JOIN TB_SHA_SCH SS ON S.SCH_NO = SS.SCH_NO
WHERE
(M.SP_RIGHT = 'Y' AND S.DEL_YN = 'N' AND C.CAL_SUB_CODE = '01') OR (SS.SHARE_ID = #{userId} AND S.DEL_YN = 'N' AND C.CAL_SUB_CODE = '01')
(M.DEPT_CODE IN ( SELECT DEPT_CODE FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} )AND M.DEPT_RIGHT = 'Y' AND S.DEL_YN = 'N' AND C.CAL_SUB_CODE = '02') OR (SS.SHARE_ID = #{userId} AND S.DEL_YN = 'N' AND C.CAL_SUB_CODE = '02')
(S.MOD_ID = #{userId} AND S.DEL_YN = 'N' AND C.CAL_SUB_CODE = '03') OR (SS.SHARE_ID = #{userId} AND S.DEL_YN = 'N' AND C.CAL_SUB_CODE = '03')

mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TB_SCHEDULE WHERE DEL_YN = 'Y' AND MOD_DATE < ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1) + 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_CALENDAR ( CAL_NO, REG_ID, DEPT_CODE, CAL_SUB_CODE, REG_DATE, MOD_DATE, MOD_ID, DEL_YN, CAL_COLOR ) SELECT SEQ_CALNO.nextval, #{userId}, #{deptCode}, sub.CAL_SUB_CODE, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{userId}, 'N', CASE WHEN sub.CAL_SUB_CODE = '01' THEN '#a82626c3' WHEN sub.CAL_SUB_CODE = '02' THEN '#104fa1c3' WHEN sub.CAL_SUB_CODE = '03' THEN '#358657c3' ELSE null END FROM (SELECT '01' AS CAL_SUB_CODE FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '02' AS CAL_SUB_CODE FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '03' AS CAL_SUB_CODE FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '04' AS CAL_SUB_CODE FROM DUAL) sub
